title: Proactively Ask for Customer Feedback
description: A few days after an order is delivered, an automated system should ask the customer for feedback on their experience.

tasks.description: Identify orders that were marked as 'Delivered' 3-5 days ago.
tasks.expected_outcome: System generates a list of recent, completed orders.

tasks.description: For each order, send a personalized email asking the customer to rate their experience and review the products they purchased.
tasks.expected_outcome: System successfully sends out feedback request emails.
